title: Profile Generator
description: Create a mini user profile using different data types and Template Literals.
instructions:
1.  Create a `const` variable named `userName` with the value `'Alice'`.
2.  Create a `let` variable named `userAge` with the value `25`.
3.  Create a `const` variable named `isLearning` with the value `true`.
4.  Use `console.log()` and a Template Literal to display exactly: `Name: Alice, Age: 25, Learning: true`.

commonMistakes.consequence: The variables won't be replaced with their values.

commonMistakes.mistake: Putting quotes around numbers or booleans
commonMistakes.consequence: The values become strings instead of their actual types.
